items.sentence: I want to know what\'s likely to happen if we do that.
I want to know why Tom didn\'t go to Boston with Mary.
Tom told me that he had a dream about Mary last night.
Tom told me you think I had something to do with this.
Tom tried to ask Mary a question, but she ignored him.
Tom has confidence in Mary\'s ability to win the race.
Tom has his ex-girlfriend\'s name tattooed on his arm.
Tom has lied to me in the past, so I don\'t trust him.
Tom was afraid that he might get expelled from school.
Your composition is perfect except for a few mistakes.
I have a long list of things I\'m not supposed to eat.
I don\'t think it\'ll be difficult for you to do that.
If you ask me, talking to Tom will be a waste of time.
Tom says he knows someone who\'s a good sketch artist.
She had her husband drive the children to their homes.
We had lunch at Chuck\'s Bar and Grill on Park Street.
Tom let Mary take the credit for organizing the party.
I think this is the best Chinese restaurant in Boston.
I thought I heard you say something about this to Tom.
Tom says he can\'t ignore Mary\'s behavior any longer.
